snp4.12:5.2: Bālomako → bālo mago (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
snp4.12:6.3: parihīnapañño → koci nihīnapañño (bj, sya-all) | kocipi nihīnapañño (mr)
snp4.12:16.2: suddhimakevalī te → suddhimakevali te (bj) | suddhimakevalīno (si, pts-vp-pli1ed)
snp4.12:18.3: medhagamāvaheyya → medhagaṃ āvaheyya (bj, sya-all) | medhakaṃ āvaheyya (pts-vp-pli1ed)
